contract is the base of the dapp","methods":{"cancelInvoice(uint256)":{"details":"Cancels an invoice","params":{"invoiceId":"The id of the invoice (given by the smart-contract)"}},"closeDispute(uint256)":{"details":"Closes a dispute","params":{"invoiceId":"The id of the invoice (given by the smart-contract)"}},"createDraftInvoice(string,uint256[],uint256,bool,uint256,uint8,uint256)":{"details":"Creates a new draft invoice","params":{"allowPartialPayment":"If partial payment is allowed","amount":"The amount of the invoice","customers":"The ein of the customers (in an array)","id":"A custom id for the invoice","minimumAmountDue":"The minimum amount for a payment","paymentTerm":"The type of term of payment (DueOnReceipt, DueOnDate, NoDueDate, NetD)","term":"The term of payment (in days or a timestamp)"}},"getInvoiceDetails(uint256)":{"details":"Gets invoice details","params":{"invoiceId":"The id of the invoice (given by the smart-contract)"},"return":"The amount, paidAmount, refundedAmount, allowPartialPayment, paymentTerm and term of the invoice"},"getInvoiceInfo(uint256)":{"details":"Gets invoice info","params":{"invoiceId":"The id of the invoice (given by the smart-contract)"},"return":"The id, status, date, merchant and customers of an invoice"},"getInvoicesAdditionalDetails(uint256)":{"details":"Gets invoice additional details","params":{"invoiceId":"The id of the invoice (given by the smart-contract)"},"return":"The additionalTerms and note of the invoice"},"getInvoicesFromCustomer(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the invoices of a customer","params":{"ein":"The ein of the customer"},"return":"The id of the invoices"},"getInvoicesFromMerchant(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the invoices of a merchant","params":{"ein":"The ein of the merchant"},"return":"The id of the invoices"},"isOwner()":{"return":"true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract."},"openDispute(uint256,string)":{"details":"Opens a dispute","params":{"details":"The details of the dispute","invoiceId":"The id of the invoice (given by the smart-contract)"}},"owner()":{"return":"the address of the owner."},"payInvoice(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Pays an invoice","params":{"amount":"The amount used to pay","invoiceId":"The id of the invoice (given by the smart-contract)"}},"refundCustomer(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Refunds a customer","params":{"amount":"The amount to refund","customer":"The ein of the customer","invoiceId":"The id of the invoice (given by the smart-contract)"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.","params":{"newOwner":"The address to transfer ownership to."}},"updateInvoiceCustomers(uint256,uint256[])":{"details":"Updates the customers of an invoice","params":{"customers":"The updated customers list","invoiceId":"The id of the invoice"}},"updateInvoicePayment(uint256,uint256,bool,uint256,uint8,uint256,string,string)":{"details":"Updates the payment data of an invoice","params":{"additionalTerms":"Additional terms (as a string)","allowPartialPayment":"If partial payment is allowed","amount":"The amount of the invoice","invoiceId":"The id of the invoice (given by the smart-contract)","minimumAmountDue":"The minimum amount for a payment","note":"Additional note (as a string)","paymentTerm":"The type of term of payment","term":"The term of payment, in days or a timestamp"}},"validateInvoice(uint256)":{"details":"Validates an invoice (from draft to unpaid)","params":{"invoiceId":"The id of the invoice (given by the smart-contract)"}}},"title":"Invoicing"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"renounceOwnership()":{"notice":"Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore."}},"notice":"Create invoices through Snowflake"}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/MAMPWeb/HydroIce/HydroIceContract/contracts/Invoicing.sol":"Invoicing"},"evmVersion":"byzantium","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/MAMPWeb/HydroIce/HydroIceContract/contracts/Invoicing.sol":{"keccak256":"0x66ad491e57e28f80c26b7fa1954bb0434af9b94b308bfb9315a3df5bbb5f445c","urls":["bzzr://19a629559219903b638330baf71ca5fdaa2aa1fe4630ee23f7737d54c34ea1f3"]},"/MAMPWeb/HydroIce/HydroIceContract/contracts/SnowflakeResolver.sol":{"keccak256":"0xba1200f806655b37a99b58a1e5b6d36bd09026c3a4d4a05fbc25126281a1c788","urls":["bzzr://76feb72e8a6e8ff908740a42b71427a798aa40c346868c50b7f799cdee903af6"]},"/MAMPWeb/HydroIce/HydroIceContract/contracts/interfaces/HydroInterface.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3f0b755561062d9912aca9a46d728918404fe17a09cfbadfcdd498bdd6fd0b6e","urls":["bzzr://7347515ad9e6891eadd0e635e546a4f2addd7a4121dced0b18104953a1d9b217"]},"/MAMPWeb/HydroIce/HydroIceContract/contracts/interfaces/IdentityRegistryInterface.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb559191dbd30da97a8b5759a895d7f4eff420eedc55b0786ae7206fbe384dc15","urls":["bzzr://a6122de11af1f831b1a93dba66aabe9e299f0040cf3404510790453addc6e0d9"]},"/MAMPWeb/HydroIce/HydroIceContract/contracts/interfaces/SnowflakeInterface.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb34e22de661c32131d4d5bbd8f8dbf1794e5d944736ccb31870b6f75bdd322e5","urls":["bzzr://aaa6399afaf287d517ece7ac874cf6da3c2d81f9d88cb8cdc4631adc3f4ac52a"]},"/MAMPWeb/HydroIce/HydroIceContract/contracts/interfaces/SnowflakeResolverInterface.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8a5595a41d86f78514dfcd6eaa0ec79482187b8ead1c8c129faab29aeb2aced1","urls":["bzzr://1f741c8e9d50535a1a18c71c689e1e2876cd75e30256273ffeb2b47b72bcbb76"]},"/MAMPWeb/HydroIce/HydroIceContract/contracts/zeppelin/math/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2cee2f0a5f7c68ece40aa1641b34177859058b4b3d74f243112c96f0bff7d54b","urls":["bzzr://f84a966fb57ec20ab2ed137b385c332cb5f67a5ad2ee5c46eb64b3ca6a6ab1cd"]},"/MAMPWeb/HydroIce/HydroIceContract/contracts/zeppelin/ownership/Ownab
